website_summaries.verdict: The 1996 Vioz Lux GTX RR is one of Zamberlan’s backcountry boots that have earned positive remarks from outdoorsy individuals. Those who are looking for a footgear that grants instant yet lasting comfort, supportive build and precise fit will surely like this offering. It, however, was reported having a flimsy sole. All in all, the Zamberlan 1996 Vioz Lux GTX RR can overcome tough and demanding terrain; its sole might not be able to take such beating though.
pros: A lot of owners comment that the Zamberlan 1996 Vioz Lux GTX RR is one of the best pair of trekking boots they ever had
Its little-to-no break-in period has impressed a majority of wearers
Based on numerous consumer reviews, the 1996 Vioz Lux GTX RR is a very comfortable gear
It runs true to size, as rated by umpteen users
Hordes of online buyers state that it’s a boot that delivers excellent warmth during winter hikes
Its superb quality is not left unnoticed by a lot of impressed owners
This Zamberlan offering is indeed supportive, especially when carrying a heavy pack, according to some users
This watertight trail hiker is effective in keeping water out, as testified by more than a handful
Scores of wearers mention that the 1996 Vioz Lux GTX RR from Zamberlan fits like a glove
The boot’s protective toe rand has received a lot of positive remarks
cons: A considerable number of verified purchasers are frustrated with the boot’s outsole as it tends to wear out quickly
A couple of buyers are not happy with the hefty weight of the 1996 Vioz Lux GTX RR

customer_reviews.title: I think the toe guards are a great addition and will help keep the boots looking better ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for the Zamberlan Vioz GTX boots I've buying. The fit is exactly the same between the boots. There was a bit of noise from the leather uppers on these over the older Vioz GTX models but now that I've worn them a bit the noise is gone. I think the toe guards are a great addition and will help keep the boots looking better longer. Bottom line I love them just like the older Vioz GTX model.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots
customer_reviews.text: best hiking boots I ever had. Wear them all day even when I'm hiking the streets of New York City. Very expensive but for me, they are really worth it!
customer_reviews.author: RavMoshe

customer_reviews.title: Worth. Every. Penny.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey and worth it... Easily the most comfortable out-of-the-box boots that I’ve ever bought. Traction downhill is amazing due to the forward-facing wedge on the heel. That was the first thing I noticed on my first hike with them. Also noticed the arch support is stiff—in a good way. You can step onto the point of a rock and the arch can take your full weight and distributes the pressure away from the center of your foot. (I had to test it.) Thick leather, reinforced toe. The tongue is incorporated in such a way that water and debris never get into the boot. Worth. Every. Penny.
customer_reviews.author: Talmadge Janeauxn

customer_reviews.title: Rugged; time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, well made. My only gripe is that I have been used to the Asolo lacing system which holds tight all day; these boots seem to loosen up over a short period of time even if double-knotted. I’ve been using them for physical work indoor and out and they seem rugged, but time will tell. Made the switch from Asolo after over 20 years of brand loyalty...the last 3 pair resulted in detached soles so I wanted to try another top brand. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Footwear Addict

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic heal inserts will give u blisters
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with product and wish I would of went with the 996 pair. My heals rub really bad and I got blisters like you couldnt believe. And I'm stuck wearing these cuz I cant afford another pair. Also they were way bigger then expect.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: the very best boots you can purchase
customer_reviews.text: As always these are in my opinion, the very best boots you can purchase, read all the reviews, there is a reason why we all say the same things about any of the zamberlan boots long lasting, comfortable right from the get go, but a pair, don,t worry about the expensive price you,ll have them for a long time , with minimal care, just bought my new pair to replace my old ones, 8years worth of hard use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Danners, Red Wings, Carhartt, and Ariat. Zamberlan brings it.
customer_reviews.text: I have never put on a more comfortable boot in my life. The quality is undeniable. The packaging is spectacular as well. Comes with cleaning intructions, an extra pair of laces, and a tiny leather shield to put on your keychain. The Italian style is the probably the best part of putting these on. Well done Zamberlan.
customer_reviews.author: Zeven

customer_reviews.title: Black Zamberlan 1996 Vioz GTX RR
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Zamberlan boots for 10 years now. Specially these 1996 GTX line. This black pair is the first pair to ever make noise while walking and I have worn them probably close to 25 hours and they still make noise from which comes from around the ankle area. Like not broke in?
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: The BEST CO FOR BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: Best boots EVER!!!! zamberlan's are amazing, this pair prompted me to get a pair. We are a Zamberlan boot wearing,hiking, climbing, exploring IN COMFORT AND WITH NO rocks bruised bottom of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sheton

customer_reviews.title: tuff enough
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these boots to everyone this is my third pair I only work in one pair and they are in great shape still ive had them for 7 years and when I put them on it is like the first time these boots are worth the money you have got to get you a pair and you will see how awesome they are
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are some bad ass boots. Well made. No break in needed. Can’t comfortable and very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Beat boot I ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this boot. I have worn Asolo boots forever. These boots put them to shame. Tuff and rugged are words to describe. Hold your foot tight in the boot. No sliding around. Very comfortable. Can’t say enough. Buy um. You’ll like um
customer_reviews.author: greg groves

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart - so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After less than 100 Pacific Northwest trail miles, chunks of the soles are breaking off, and the seam at the top of both tongues has split open. I bought these 1 year 11 months ago, so the Zamberlan USA warranty has already expired. 2 stars because they're gorgeous and fit as expected. Only 2 stars because there's no way $300+ boots should be falling apart so young.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: ... boots all my life and these boots are the best I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I have worn hiking boots all my life and these boots are the best I have ever seen . Great fit , on first day I hiked 6 miles and had no issues. Since then many miles and they still feel great and are holding up fantastic. I recommend these to anyone looking for a good quality boot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bruce J. Sebestyen

customer_reviews.title: Best boots anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box! The quality of the workmanship is incredible.... I just ordered a second pair in another color!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best boot i ever purchased by far, been my feet have been missing out on these boots .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best purchase I've ever made. These boots are superb. The quality is so sturdy and they look so beefy. I will be purchasing the black pair soon. They are super duper awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Artie

customer_reviews.title: No break in needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, I purchase a new pair once a year. The sole wears out the same time the laces do.
customer_reviews.author: RTA

customer_reviews.title: Okay boots, lasted almost (5) five months.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Definitely get what you pay for with these! Bought them in February, heels falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Denae P. Tait

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: needs more padding along the top of the boot like my Asolo's.
customer_reviews.author: graff22

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the boots but seem to run a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing boot ever. I am a huge fan. No break in. Very comfortable. Amazing craftsmanship. I would so recommend these. I have winter boots from them and now these. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Your going to love these boots best hiking boot iv ever owed . Definitely worth the extra cash .
customer_reviews.author: Colm Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great boots. Zamberlan boots are always comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Zamberlan boots are always comfortable. These have the siped sole and give amazing traction. Good support even when carrying a heavy pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: zamberlan is best boot made...the Italians know their leather...and the rocker lasts are terrific...
customer_reviews.author: George H. Wilson, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, high comfort right from the start.
customer_reviews.text: Only a week in but I certainly am impressed and glad I stepped up!😎🤘
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He loves them. Wears them to work in his suit.
customer_reviews.author: Hil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hiking shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I have already purchased 2 of those and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Danilo Pimenta

customer_reviews.title: Best boots money can buy...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Zamberlans and I'm still amazed at how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Birznieks

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best boots. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I’ve ever owned. I’ll never go back to cloth boots.
customer_reviews.author: knowhere0

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Breaking them in now
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Breaking them in now. Only had them for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fantastic boot.
customer_reviews.text: Ready right out of the box. Perfect fit, no break in time needed.
customer_reviews.author: tc md

customer_reviews.title: Great but loud
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for a month. I like them very much. But they are loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I will always buy these as long the quality stays as it is.
customer_reviews.text: Vasqe, quit making.the Sundowner and these boots are better, much to my surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great boots all the way around with support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the rubber Protector over the front toe. I use them for work and the always get scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: jesus lopez

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: These are like having little Range Rovers attached to your feet...Well made, sturdy, super comfortable for all day wear and most of all very good looking boot. I feel I can walk for miles on any terrain. I've been wearing mine nearly every day for the past month. They are completely comfortable out of the box. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: My new gear

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this boot, DO NOT order it directly through Zamberlan. Order it through Amazon, REI, or some other trusted retailer. I followed Zamberlan's advice, I measured and downsized from the 12 I normally wear to an 11.5, but the 11.5 1996 VIOZ LUX GTX that arrived were to small. No big deal, right. This happens. I called to do a return/exchange. No one answered and I left a message. I emailed them. I made a return request through the website. I also called again. Sure, I get email replies that do not help me. I'm hoping to get back on the trails soon!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

product_meta.title: Zamberlan 1996 VIOZ Lux Gore-TEX Walking Boots - AW20
product_meta.description: Zamberlan 1996 Vioz Lux Gore Tex Walking Boots Stay protected no matter what the weather thanks to the GORE-TEX membrane offering breathable and durable protection from the elements. Waxed Tuscan Full-Grain Leather Upper The upper of the Zamberlan 1996 Vioz Lux GORE-TEX Walking Boots are constructed with the upgraded Waxed Tuscan full-grain leather which is rich and long-lasting. The leathers are enhanced with Zamberlan's proprietary Hydrobloc treatment for added water resistance and durability over time. Made with GORE-TEX Performance Comfort Footwear, it ensures the shoes engineered with this are designed for outdoor use in moderate weather conditions. They combine durable waterproofness and optimised breathability, offering enduring waterproof protection and optimised climate comfort. Water stays on the outside while perspiration can easily escape from the inside. Thanks to their innovative construction they are an ideal solution for the widest range of outdoor activities and changing weather conditions. Designed with new calf-leather lined collars, it adds durability while ensuring maximum comfort around the upper ankle, reducing the risk of chafing and discomfort. Get the feel of a leather-lined boot without compromising on waterproof performance. For additional durability on the upper, high resistance treated hardware allows for an extended life without corrosion with added durability against rocks and debris, and easy passing of laces towards preventing breakage. The PU coated rubber toe rands also adds durability to the boot and life to the leather uppers, especially above the toe bump. The upper also ensures the wearer with maximum comfort and flexibility thanks to the ZFS (Zamberlan Flex System) which describes the unique multi-directional joint that offers great lateral support, comfort and freedom of movement of the ankle and overall stability. The boot upper flexes exactly trailing the natural foot and lower leg movement, giving lots of lat
feature_bullets: Waxed Tuscan Full-Grain Leather Upper - Rich and long-lasting.
Hydrobloc - A special leather has been treated in the tanning process to increase it's water resistance and durability.
GORE-TEX Performance Comfort Footwear - Keeps your feet dry from the outside as well as from the inside.
Calf-Leather Line Collars - Adds durability while ensuring maximum comfort.
High Resistance Treated Hardware - Allows for an extended lift without corrosion.
